* BrightBlade looked around the air duct as she moved along inside, not 
daring to use her scanners for fear of detection.
She came to bend in the vent the went off to the east, following it 
carefully until she came to another grating.
It seemed to look out onto a small storage bay, but she knew that in order 
to get the info she needed she was required to tap into a main console.
BrightBlade looked through the vent for a sec but then continued on, in hope 
that she would run into a console soon.
It wasn't long before she looked out from another vent grating and suddenly 
spyed a personalized computer in an empty room, most likely a set of 
quarters.
She smiled, those comps always did have access into the main computer core, 
and if they didn't then she could fix that easily.
BrightBlade looked over to the corner of the room and saw a security camera, 
slowly moving from side to side.
With a quick reflex she quickly removed the holds of the vent cover and 
slipped inside the room, replacing it again just before the camera turned in 
her direction again.
She watched as it servayed the area in which she was located but then turned 
to check the remainder of the room.
Without a moment's notice she opened her leg compartment and scooted ober to 
the camera, removing a plam sized comp and a transfer cord.
Quickly hooking it up to the camera she downloaded a program that would make 
it seem as if the room was normal...so it wouldn't be able to record that 
she had turned on the computer.
With that done she placed the equipment into her compartment and went over 
to the computer again, flipping the top up and turning it on.
Now was the real test, finding the information in which she needed.*
